long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Roivenue for Chrome is a plugin that seamlessly integrates insights from Roivenue's AI attribution model into your marketing campaigns. With just one click, you can access data from the Roivenue application directly within the UI of the selected marketing platform. This extension allows you to select and view data for any metric on campaign and ad group overviews. To view the data from Roivenue in Google Analytics, you must sign in using OAuth authentication within the Roivenue app.
